nodes.bodyText: This looks wrong. Is messageVersion() really the IBP, or is it the log.message.format.version?
This looks a bit fragile. Maybe we should parse it as dotted decimals and not assume that the 3rd character is the whole minor number.
I agree. But it is really just copy paste of existing code. So I think we should leave that for separate PR.
Copy and paste and no factor out common method? 😱 But I'm fine with a follow-up PR if you prefer.
